sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		City as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string,
		Prop_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: Unpivot1
transformations.script:
Filter1 unpivot(output(
		Address1 as string,
		City as string
	),
	ungroupBy(AddressID),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
